description: He's back!!! Yeah, Brodie, the mega-stud that hasn't graced our sites in quite some time.If you are unfamiliar with him, Brodie is an ex-military man turned amateur porn star. We always get tons of positive responses when this young guy shows up, and you're about to see why.We have more scenes in store for you, but we'll let you feast your eyes on him while he plays with himself in the pool, and unloads his balls on our bar stool. Thanks Brodie!Enjoy!
title: Brodie
